conversion_verification.notes: True 3D transformation confirmed with consistent wall thicknesses and isometric perspective.

3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Excellent wall geometry and volume perception. Nearly perfect 3D cutaway execution.

geometric_accuracy.notes: Room configurations and adjacencies are highly accurate. Most windows and doors are correctly placed, though the entrance door visibility is slightly obscured by the wall height.

interior_elements.notes: Furniture placement matches the 2D plan precisely, including the bedroom layout, dining set, and living room arrangement.

visual_clarity.notes: Clean rendering with logical lighting. Materials are distinct. No text artifacts present.

detected_errors.description: The kitchen entry opening is narrower in 3D compared to the plan.

summary: A highly faithful 3D conversion that maintains strict geometric adherence to the original floor plan layout and furniture placement.
